resources.string:
In most cases, you can create an RSS feed by adding ".rss" to the end of an existing reddit URL: 

 Front page: http://www.reddit.com/.rss 
 A subreddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/worldnews/.rss 
 A multireddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/news+wtf/.rss 


Visit reddit.com/wiki/rss for more info
